name: Winterland
description:
This is a short peaceful RPG. You will visit villages without spring. You can only joke, dance, stare, run away and hug. You must go to “Yomotsuku mountain” to see your precious.

Features:

  • Sparkling winter world depicted in pixel art
  • Simple gameplay (just walk, battle, and eat cookies!)
  • On your turn, use five commands and see how your opponent reacts (and end the battle peacefully).
  • On your opponent's turn, press the arrow keys at the right moment to guard against attacks. (Press "T", "C", "K", and "W" simultaneously to switch to "invulnerability mode", which does not result in game over.)
